converter.title: Converter of most common archery measures

about.title: About this App
about.intro: UArchery is a comprehensive web application designed to help archery federations manage tournaments, participants, and competitions efficiently. Built with modern technologies, it provides a complete solution for tournament organization from registration to patrol generation.

current.auth: User Authentication & Authorization - JWT-based authentication with Google OAuth, password reset, and role-based access control
current.profiles: User Profiles - Complete profile management with avatar upload, bio, location, federation number, and favorite bow categories
current.tournaments: Tournament Management - Create, edit, and manage tournaments with banners, attachments, location mapping, and application deadlines
current.applications: Tournament Applications - Submit applications with category, division, and equipment selection. Admin approval workflow with status tracking
current.patrols: Patrol System - Automatic patrol generation with intelligent grouping by bow category, division, and gender. Drag-and-drop management interface and PDF export
current.admin: Admin Panel - User management, application approvals, tournament oversight, and system administration
current.categories: Bow Categories Management - Complete CRUD for bow categories with rule references
current.clubs: Clubs Management - Manage archery clubs with logos, descriptions, and locations
current.divisions: Divisions Management - Age group and division management linked to rules
current.rules: Rules Management - Official archery rules with multi-language descriptions and PDF downloads
current.converter: Unit Converter - Convert between common archery measurements (inches/cm, pounds/kg, grains/grams, yards/meters)
current.uploads: File Upload System - Image processing for avatars and banners, attachment management for tournaments
current.multilang: Multi-language Support - Available in English, Ukrainian, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese
current.pwa: Progressive Web App - Installable PWA with offline capabilities

planned.trainingLog: Training Log - Track personal training sessions with detailed statistics
planned.achievements: Achievements System - Demo page available, full tracking coming soon
planned.competitions: Competition Features - Enhanced competition management and scoring
planned.duels: Friendly Challenges - Challenge other archers to friendly duels
planned.news: News & Updates - Tournament news and federation announcements
planned.calendar: Event Calendar - Integrated calendar view of tournaments and events
planned.knowledgeBase: Knowledge Base - Comprehensive archery encyclopedia and resources

about.contact: For feature requests, bug reports, or questions, please contact

trainings.title: My trainings
trainings.info:
Chapter "My trainings" allows to create any amount of personal trainings, select target, distance, arrows count, etc.
For every training detailed statistic is available. User can share his stats.
IMPORTANT: information from training is not sending anywhere and is stored only on your device (at least now)
trainings.deleteHint: All results for this training will be deleted

inchCm.desc: Used to measure bow and arrow length, etc.

grainG.desc: Used to measure arrow/broadhead weight, etc.
